Title: Authorizes the village of Croton-on-Hudson, county of Westchester, to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parkland
Summary: Authorizes the village of Croton-on-Hudson, county of Westchester, to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parkland to establish the Croton Landing Park solar canopy project.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the village of Croton-on-Hudson, county of Westchester, to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parkland
